com.sharethrough.sdk

Class Sharethrough

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sharethrough.sdk.Sharethrough

  • public class Sharethrough
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to handle configuration for Sharethrough's Android SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Sharethrough.OnStatusChangeListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the status of having or not having ads to show changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey)
        Returns an instance of the Sharethrough object which is used to fetch and display native ads within your mobile app.

        A default ad cache time of 20 seconds will be used.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            int adCacheTimeInMilliseconds)
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        adCacheTimeInMilliseconds - The ad cache time in milliseconds. e.g. a value of 100,000 will result in ads being refreshed every 100 seconds.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            boolean dfpEnabled)
        Returns an instance of the Sharethrough object which is used to fetch and display native ads within your mobile app.

        A default ad cache time of 20 seconds will be used.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        dfpEnabled - A boolean flag indicating if you would like to use Sharethrough's Direct Sell functionality via DFP.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            int adCacheTimeInMilliseconds,
            boolean dfpEnabled)
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        adCacheTimeInMilliseconds - The ad cache time in milliseconds. e.g. a value of 100,000 will result in ads being refreshed every 100 seconds.
        dfpEnabled - A boolean flag indicating if you would like to use Sharethrough's Direct Sell functionality via DFP.

        Parameters:

        feedPosition - The starting position in your feed where you would like your first ad.
